## Properties

| Property        | Attribute        | Description           | Type                        | Default                               |
| --------------- | ---------------- | --------------------- | --------------------------- | ------------------------------------- |
| `color`         | `color`          | Line/bar color        | `string`                    | `'var(--erx-color-primary, #667eea)'` |
| `curved`        | `curved`         | Curve line (smooth)   | `boolean`                   | `true`                                |
| `data`          | --               | Data points           | `number[]`                  | `[]`                                  |
| `fillColor`     | `fill-color`     | Fill color (for area) | `string \| undefined`       | `undefined`                           |
| `height`        | `height`         | Chart height          | `number`                    | `24`                                  |
| `shouldAnimate` | `should-animate` | Animate on load       | `boolean`                   | `true`                                |
| `showLast`      | `show-last`      | Show last value dot   | `boolean`                   | `true`                                |
| `showMinMax`    | `show-min-max`   | Show min/max dots     | `boolean`                   | `false`                               |
| `type`          | `type`           | Chart type            | `"area" \| "bar" \| "line"` | `'line'`                              |
| `width`         | `width`          | Chart width           | `number`                    | `100`                                 |
